net.derquinse.common.orm.hib

Class AbstractHibernateDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.derquinse.common.orm.hib.AbstractHibernateDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DAO
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HibernateGeneralDAO, HibernateGenericDAO

    public abstract class AbstractHibernateDAO
extends Object
implements DAO
    Abstract implementation for general and generic DAO.
    Author:
    Andres Rodriguez

      • hasRows

        protected boolean hasRows(Query query)
        Returns whether a query has results. Set the first result to 0 and the maximum number of results to 1.
        Parameters:
        query - Query to execute.
        Returns:
        True if the query provides any result, false otherwise.

      • unique

        protected <T> T unique(Class<T> type,
           Query query)
        Returns the unique result of a query returning instances of a specified class.
        Parameters:
        type - Entity type.
        query - Query to execute.
        Returns:
        The unique result or null if there are no results.
        Throws:
        NonUniqueResultException - if there are more than one result.

      • findByIds

        protected final <T extends Entity<ID>,ID extends Serializable> Map<ID,T> findByIds(Criteria criteria,
                                                                 Iterable<? extends ID> ids)
        Finds a set of entities by ID.
        Parameters:
        criteria - Criteria to use. It must be over the requested type.
        ids - IDs to find.
        Returns:
        The requested entity or null if it is not found.
